AB-CO Hardware and Timing Section Home Page

This is the first version of a website for the Hardware and Timing section of the new AB Controls group. You will find here information about the AB-CO-HT section as well as data to be shared among the members of the section. 

Links of interest:

PS-CO timing page.
SL-CO timing page.
PS-CO Hardware Modules EDMS page.
LHC-CP Analog Signals Working Group.
Setup notes for the PP CP1 CompactPCI CPU module.
OASIS Project page.

Presentation of the Central Sequencing in the PS (4 Sept. 2002), by Jean-Claude Bau (html).

Presentation of the Distributed Timing in the PS (4 Sept. 2002), by Jean-Marc Bouché (pdf).

José Carlos Da Silva (EP-HC) kindly agreed to share his TTCrx jitter measurements with us (12 Sept. 2002). We can see the general TTC distribution jitter (pdf) and the results for the TTC system plus his SLB-PMC card (pdf).

The second edition of "The PS Controls for newcomers" (pdf). Still useful even if not updated as regularly as it should...

24 September 2002: first release of "LHC Timing Strategy" (pdf).

22 October 2002: A proposal for a CERN accelerator timing strategy, presented to the LHC-CP by Julian Lewis (pdf).

17 September 2003:

  • Presentation on the SPS timing, by Delphine Jacquet (pdf and ppt).
  • Presentation on the PS timing, by Jean-Claude Bau (pdf and ppt).
  • How to merge the PS and SPS timing systems together, by Julian Lewis (pdf and ppt).

ICALEPCS 2003 papers:

  • "An FPGA based multiprocessing CPU for Beam Synchronous Timing in CERN's SPS and LHC" (pdf).
  • "Nanosecond level UTC Timing Generation and Stamping in CERN's LHC" (pdf).
  • "The Evolution of the CERN SPS Timing System for the LHC era" (pdf).
  • "OASIS: A new system to acquire and display the analog signals for LHC" (pdf).
  • "PLL usage in the General Machine Timing System for the LHC" (pdf).
  • "VME switch for CERN's PS Analog Video System" (pdf).

14 January 2004: Javier Gimeno's presentation on fiber optics technology for the LHC beam interlocks (ppt).
